sections.title: Gender
description: The night has begun in earnest, moon shining bright and full, and so your lady has need of you, her most important servant. But before you make haste, a small question, are you man or damsel?
Choose One

choices.title: Male
description: A gentleman should always have a lady to serve, as is proper, common, and known, more so when she is a lady of the night. Continue with your work, good sir, and do not keep your lady waiting.

choices.title: Female
description: There are those that would consider such a close relationship between women preposterous, but beings of the night like your lady care not for them. After all, how does sex matter for those that can't bear nor sire children, and possess unnatural strength? Continue your tasks, fair damsel, and do not keep the lady waiting.

sections.title: Entourage Role
description: All proper rulers of the night have an Entourage by their side, and your lady is no different. The four roles that comprise one have been upheld since antiquity, and you fall squarely in one of them.
Choose One

choices.title: Knight
description: The knight is the spear pointed outwards, the one that sheds blood for their lord far away from their demesne. A knight's day to day duties include the hunting of prey for their master, patrolling their liege's lands and ensuring they remain free of undesirables and upholding said liege's authority wherever they go.

choices.title: Headservant
description: The headservant is the shield to the knight's spear. Always close to their lieges, headservants work and toil to ensure their master's safety, comfort and happiness. Usually, they are considered to speak with their lord's authority and can give orders to the other members of their liege's Entourage.

choices.title: Chamberlain
description: As chamberlain, you ensure that your lady remains unassailed by the stress of managing her vast riches and that said riches don't unduly diminish. By the nature of their work, chamberlains are the ones that interact with the world of the day the most, and so are also tasked with maintaining their liege and the rest of the night hidden at any cost.

choices.title: Hidden Blade
description: There are tasks that require a special sort of secrecy, and for those tasks were those such as you found. Hidden Blades carry out assassinations, espionage, contraband, and other unseemly things in the name of their liege, against enemies both within and without vampire society.

sections.title: Denizen Type
description: Almost as important as the service you render is you own nature as a denizen of the night. What, exactly, are you?
Choose One

choices.title: Human
description: As a human, you lack the unnatural strength and powers of those that dwell in the dark, but your cleverness more than makes up for it.
Moreover, you also lack the multitude of weakness that plague supernatural creatures. There's a reason humans are the dominant species in the planet, after all.

choices.title: Vampire
description: The self-proclaimed kings of the night possess many powers, such as shapeshifting into various animals or mist, a gaze able to place the weak-willed under their control, and strong regeneration. However they also have a plethora of weakness, from the sun rendering them weaker than a human child to not being able to cross running water, passing through holy symbols and garlic.

choices.title: Lycanthrope
description: Lycanthropes are among the most feared beings that go bump in the night, deservedly so, for they possess peerless strength, skin though enough to deflect blades and their wounds close so fast that blows look like they have no effect. Yet their weakness to silver is well known, even the most slight contact with pure enough silver will make a lycanthrope's blood rot and poison their body.

choices.title: Stranger
description: The gods of the void are feared beyond measure, gargantuan entities that can crush civilizations like one does an ant, but what of their lesser kin? For those weak ones, the void is a horrible place, and when they manage to anchor themselves to any reality, they'll clutch to it with all their strength. Strange beings yet so surprisingly human, as long as the mask remains on.

sections.title: Your Lady's Age
description: Now, there's the matter of your lady. As a vampire, perhaps the most important question about her is her age. How long has it take her to gather all her power, and most importantly, get you in her service?
Choose One

choices.title: Youngling
description: So young she might be as well be a mortal, her appearance matching her age. By what miraculous situation could she have acquired so much power, power that evades those a century her senior? And how could she get your servitude, much less gather an entourage? Perhaps you were willing, and that's the reason for her success?
Gain a normal perk.

choices.title: Matured
description: A proper vampire, a century or two older than her appearance would suggest. It's at this age that vampires begin to expand their influence, attempting to go from mere predators to lofty lords. Your lady has been splendidly successful, owing to industrious work from both of you.
Gain a class talent.

choices.title: Elder
description: It's only logical that your lady would have an Entourage, with her great clout and age. She has seen many, many things in her more than five hundred years of age and has great experience on many fronts. By being so close to her for so long, some of it has stuck with you.
Gain a special talent.

choices.title: Ancient
description: A being so old that it can only be called a vampire for her thirst for blood, a being that has been called both god and demon. You do not know why she chose you, but you should feel honored. Being bound by blood to such an idiosyncratic being has made you the only person that, perhaps, she can call kin.
Gain an altered perk.

sections.title: Your Lady's Appearance
description: Next is her appearance. Vampires are vain creatures by nature, and there is no doubt your lady strives to make the best of whatundeath granted her.
Choose One

choices.title: Wolf Among Sheep
description: Your lady is practically indistinguishable from a human being, and only her beauty and sharp fangs might give something away. Some days you could almost forget what she is, and what you are to her, so normal do her actions look. It doesn't help, that she is so dedicated to her hobbies.
Your lady has an extra hobby.

choices.title: Unnatural Semblance
description: Corpse-like paleness, cold as death, fangs that spring from her mouth and hair that moves on its own. Your lady is recognizable as a vampire by anyone with the smallest clue about the supernatural, so you are all the more diligent to protect her from those that realize the truth.
Gain a class talent.

choices.title: Beautiful Corpse
description: Deathly wounds still open, eyes like glass, and mist that hangs on her like a constant veil. Yet those things that should be horrible are instead beautiful, perhaps because it's your lady who bears them. Still, no one can deny that her closeness with death grants her power, and as her servant so does it to you.
Gain a normal perk.

choices.title: Inhuman Aspect
description: Truly, most would not think your lady a vampire. With horns, tails, and claws, she looks more like a demon or even a dragon than a vampire. Just what strange circumstances have made her look like so? But such strange blood has it's advantages, as you can tell.
Gain an altered perk

sections.title: Your Lady's Nature
description: In all the years you have been by her side, you have grown to know your lady well. What would you say is her nature?
Choose One

choices.title: Innocent Doll
description: Your lady is the very image of purity, childish wonder and behavior almost overpowering the predator within. It is saddening that such a flower needs to be watered by blood, but you'll ensure it grows, protected and smiling.
Gain a class talent.

choices.title: Arrogant Youth
description: Is it not true that your lady has vast riches, powers and most of all, you by her side? Then why should she bother with fake humility, when she stands high above so many others? Her smug demeanor is constant, and to back it up, you have honed yourself.
Gain a normal perk.

choices.title: Alluring Temptress
description: Your lady takes enjoyment in being the kind of death men desire and fantasize about. Even you are not spared her teasing charms, in fact, she seems to focus them on you. Still, such beauty, even when it lies far, is bound to attract undesirables, which you'll have to deal with.
Gain a normal perk.

choices.title: Plucked Flower
description: Your lady bears her position like a crown of thorns, with pained somberness and regal coldness. Indeed, undeath has not been kind to her unbeating heart, and many wounds still lie open within. You do what you can to comfort her, of course, but some things might be beyond help.
Gain a class talent.

sections.title: Your Lady's Origins
description: And in those same years, she grew enough trust in you to share her origins. How did she lose her mortality and became what she is?
Choose One

choices.title: Embraced
description: The most common birth of a vampire, and also the most tumultuous. The web of relationships between progenitors and embraced can very easily turn or be turned into an asphyxiating rope. It is a good thing that your lady walked out of it relatively unscathed. Still, debts remain.
Gain a class talent.

choices.title: Born Cold
description: It is a miraculous happenstance, far rarer than a hen's tooth or a serpent's foot, but sometimes a barren womb and dead seed produce further unlife. The resulting children are more powerful than their brethren, and undoubtedly more cherished. Your lady must have had a beautiful childhood.
Your lady has an extra hobby.

choices.title: Eschewed Mortality
description: There are those adept enough in the arts of blackest magic to separate the indivisible and remove the humanity from themselves in a bound to seize eternity. Your lady has a deep understanding of mutation between one nature and another, and so you can reap the benefits.
Gain an altered perk.

choices.title: Vengeful Dead
description: Your lady's death was a humiliating, sordid affair. One that left a festering wound and a simmering rage in her soul. Stains big enough that only did they push the soul to pull itself together, but also raise the body in a mockery of life. You do not know what reparations she intends to demand, only that you better ready yourself for when the time comes.
Gain a normal perk.

sections.title: Your Relationship With Your Lady
description: Be honest, after all these years, how would you describe your relationship with your lady?
Choose One

choices.title: Cold and Proper
description: Duty and respect are the most important part of your relationship, endearment and trust are there, but they are secondary. She is your lady, and for that reason do you serve, if she were not, you would serve another. That is how it should be for all lords and ladies of the night. How surprisingly sensible.

choices.title: Mutually Beneficial
description: Honor and duty are fine pursuits, but both your lady and you know that the bond between you is a bit more pragmatical. It isn't that you don't care about each other, but both of you understand that your service isn't free and neither is her goodwill. As long as both of you continue to play your parts your mutual contract will remain standing, but not a day longer.

choices.title: Almost Family
description: You being her vassal might as well be a charade, for it is obvious how much you care about each other. Even if she were not your lady, you still would aid her however you can, and even if you were incapable of rendering any service, still would she protect and care for you. An enviable relationship, yet one that can bring much pain.

choices.title: Licentiously Warm
description: It is taboo for liege and vassal to be so bound by passion, but for a being that has eternity ahead of her, a taboo is nothing but something to delight in breaking. She loves you with a flame that matches any living one, and perhaps you feel the same.

sections.title: What makes you special
description: Now, there must be a reason your lady holds you in such high esteem. What makes you special?
Choose One

choices.title: Hybrid
description: You're a creature betwixt two natures, granting you the strengths of both. Being such a truly strange thing has made you both very useful and very valuable to your lady.
Gain a normal perk, and normal perks can now be selected from your chosen species' section and another species' of your choice.

choices.title: Talented
description: You are by nature far superior to most members of your kind. Having skills, talent, and potential that can't be matched by others, no matter how hard they train or exert themselves, means you're quite irreplaceable.
Gain two normal perks.

choices.title: Versatile
description: While most members of an Entourage are handpicked for their skills at a single role, your lady chose you, at least in part, for your superb skills at two of the roles within an Entourage.
Gain a class talent, and class talents can now be selected from your chosen class' section and another classes' of your choice.

choices.title: Bacchian
description: You're simply a joy to be around, your lady might spin tales of any other reason for having you at her side, but at the end of the day, it's because of the uplifting effect you have on her that she made you part of her Entourage. In fact, you make her mood so light she engages in activities she might not necessarily enjoy just because you do them with her.
Your lady has two extra hobbies.

choices.title: Unconquerable Soul
description: There is no terror that can cow your soul, no pain or fear that will make you lose your way. You are immune to all forms of mind control and have nigh endless willpower.

choices.title: Know the Night
description: A lifetime of dealing with the supernatural has given you knowledge only a few mystics can match. You know the weaknesses and customs of all but the most ridiculously obscure denizens of the night.

choices.title: Neutral Mediator
description: You are only beholden to your lady, and that lack of any further bias has made you a respected negotiator. You are asked to solve disputes almost daily, and most respect your words.

choices.title: Heaven's Blade
description: It seems the seven heavens are blind to your new loyalties. You can summon holy light to bless weapons and destroy evil, and can also awaken the true power of holy symbols and rituals.

choices.title: Military Contacts
description: You've worked with the army more than once, and the higher-ups owe you enough favors that you can request info, equipment, or even direct intervention if you are desperate enough.

choices.title: Never Alone
description: You still have some friends, loyal and true enough to risk life and limb for you. They aren't as powerful as you, but backup is always nice.

choices.title: Hemokinesis
description: The ability to manipulate blood with your thoughts. Highly lethal against most living beings, but useless against the bloodless or undead.

choices.title: Mesmerizing Gaze
description: A form of magical hypnotism where you can paralyze weak-willed being with just a look, and then lull them to sleep, feed on them, or even plant suggestions in their subconscious.

choices.title: Beckon Vermin
description: You can control great numbers of rats, doves, bats, cockroaches and other vermin. Your controlled animals can share memories with you.

choices.title: Ghoul
description: Your form of vampirism is both primitive and resilient. You are immune to sunlight and can feed on any kind of human flesh, alive or dead, apart from blood.

choices.title: Fleshwarper
description: You can shapeshift into other forms, and you are skilled enough that you can refashion parts of your body as necessary.

choices.title: Dire Bond
description: While not quite an Entourage of your own, you have at least three talented, young vampires under your orders.

choices.title: Alpha
description: You posses abilities far above the average lycanthrope, marking you as able to lead a pack. You have enough clout with other lycanthropes to force them to do your bidding.

choices.title: Totem of the Pack
description: With a howl you can call the spirits of your ancestors from across time and space. They manifest as great direwolves, and fight and hunt till their bodies hold on no more.

choices.title: Chimerism
description: Your true form has the properties of many animals and beasts, resembling a mythological monster more than a common lycanthrope. It is immensely powerful.

choices.title: Blood Moon
description: You have survived the trials of the Blood Moon, making you respected among all lycanthropes and immune to silver.

choices.title: Silver Fangs
description: A mutation has bestowed your claws and teeth with holy power, which act as a bane for most denizens of the night.

choices.title: Spirit Paths
description: Knowledge of how to traverse the spirit world allows you to travel large distances in mere minutes, but the arrival points tend to be imprecise.

choices.title: Blinding Revelation
description: Taking off your mask, you reveal your true form in a flash of light, causing horrible damage to the mind and senses of those unlucky enough to perceive you.

choices.title: Absorption
description: Holding things from this world close, you can make them desintegrate as they become a permanent part of you.

choices.title: Cultist Circle
description: Several men and women with a desire for forbidden knowledge have attached themselves to you, happy to do your bidding as long as you keep telling them truths of the void.

choices.title: Beckon Greater
description: Taking off your mask and crying like a hungry baby, you call a part of your progenitor into this world, causing terrible destruction under their nightmarish power.

choices.title: Ichorous Morphology
description: Your body is composed of a strongly acidic, dense fluid that forms squidlike shapes. Allows for shapeshifting and makes you almost immune to most forms of harm.

choices.title: Unsevered Autonomy
description: You can sever parts of your body at will, which will move as you wish them to. If given enough nutrients they will grow to be full blown clones.
